snippet.title: Bankruptcy records detail Vick's lavish spending
snippet.description:
Saturday November 22, 2008 1:00 am
... money to buy a Mercedes-Benz. His real estate holdings include the homes in Suffolk and Hampton in Virginia... dogfighting and animal cruelty charges Tuesday in a deal that calls for a suspended sentence and probation. The... horse farm where one of their two jointly owned yachts -- combined value about $225,000 -- is stored.
